author: Barry Roche
title: Man charged with stabbing his son
description: Gino Frahill hospitalised with multiple wounds following incident in Bandon
content:
A man (48) has been remanded on bail after he was charged in connection with a stabbing which left his son in a serious condition in hospital with multiple stab wounds.
Leon Frahill with a home address at Harbour View, Cobh, Co Cork, was brought before Macro… [+2003 chars]
